price: 36. Y a quien se aleje del mensaje del Clemente, le asignamos un demonio como compañero inseparable.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡشُ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ نُقَيِّضۡ لَهُۥ شَيۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿshu ʿan dhik'ri al-raḥmāni nuqayyiḍ lahu shayṭānan fahuwa lahu qarīnun
